text: (tavada ovunṭa) “niyata vaśayenma allāh meya tahanam kara tibunē yayi oba sthīra kirīmaṭa obagē sākṣīn kæn̆davāgena enu” yayi oba pavasanu. (esē ovunva kæn̆davāgena vit) ovunda (ē andamaṭama boru) sākṣi pævasuvā vuvada, (ē venuven) obat ovun samaga ekatu vī (esē) nopævasiya yutuya. tavada apagē āyāvan boru yayi kiyannangē kæmætta oba anugamanaya nokaranu. kavurun avasāna dinaya viśvāsa nokaḷehuda, ovunma tamangē deviyanṭa (bohomayak devivarunva) samānayan karannāha
